questions.text: 30 years old pregnant female complaining of hearing loss in both ears since last 5 months. One pure tone audiometry the findings were as shown in the image. Choose the most appropriate diagnosis:

choices.text: Steroids, acyclovir and eye patching and eye ointment

questions.text: A patient presents with sudden onset lower motor neuron facial paralysis on his left side. Radiological tests showed no deficits. What is the next best step in the management?

1. Cochlear nerve
2. Superior olivary complex
3. Inferior colliculus
4. Cochlear nuclei
5. Lateral lemniscus

choices.text: Vegetable foreign bodies are not common
A normal chest X ray can be seen in early cases within 24 hours

choices.text: Staphylococcus aureus is the causative organism

questions.text: All are true about Ludwig's angina except:

choices.text: Take to OT and remove the clot and re-ligation
Take to OT and pressure packing

questions.text: A post tonsillectomy child was lying in the ward he started bleeding in the ward which of the following should be done?

choices.text: Dorsal lingual branches of lingual artery
Descending palatine branch from Maxillary artery

questions.text: Main blood supply to tonsil comes from:

choices.text: Between superior and middle constrictor Muscles
Between inferior and middle constrictor Muscles
